title: The current count of total Device items is shown at the bottom but all rows are empty
content:
Symptom

In the Devices grid, the current count of total items is shown at the bottom, however,Â all rows are empty.

Cause

The HTTP request headers with the Service Management token are removed from load balancers. The error.log of UCMDB Gateway reports the following error: api-gateway.GraphqlController authentication failed due to smax token is missing Error: authentication failed due to smax token is missing

Solution

Check if the "underscores_in_headers on" setting is correctly configured in the load balancers. See Install containerized UD/UCMDB (on-premises).
